title: PAX SILICA: A New Era of US-India Tech Synergy
description: The PAX SILICA initiative promises to enhance US-India technology collaboration, heralding a new era in semiconductor manufacturing in India. With significant investments in Gujarat, spearheaded by Micron Technology, this pioneering project aims to transform India's technological landscape, bolstering artificial intelligence and global innovation.
content: The PAX SILICA initiative marks a pivotal moment in technology collaboration between the United States and India. Sanjay Mehrotra, President and CEO of Micron Technology, attributes this progress to the supportive regulatory environment in India. 'Mo... [813 chars]

title: India joins US-led ‘Pax Silica’ initiative, Gor calls it defining moment of 21st century
description: India has joined the US-led ‘Pax Silica’ initiative for artificial intelligence (AI) and supply chain security. US Ambassador Sergio Gor has called it the defining moment for the economic and technological order in the 21st century.
content:
India on Friday joined the US-led ‘Pax Silica’ initiative aimed at securing supply chains for critical technologies like artificial intelligence (AI) and semiconductors.

title: Asian shares mixed, U.S. futures edge higher as AI fears drag Wall Street lower
description: Shares were mixed Friday in Asia as worries over risks linked to massive investments in artificial intelligence and a potential U.S.-Iran conflict weighed on major benchmarks. U.S. futures edged higher, while oil prices resumed their ascent. Crude prices have climbed to their highest level since early August as both the United States and…

title: Tech Mahindra, NVIDIA partner to launch education
description: Tech Mahindra, a global provider of technology consulting and digital solutions, partnered with NVIDIA to launch a new education-focused Large Language Model (LLM) under its Project Indus initiative. Tech Mahindra confirmed that the Hindi-first model is built with authentic Indian linguistic and cultural context to provide sovereign and scalable artificial intelligence.
content: New Delhi [India], February 20 (ANI): Tech Mahindra, a global provider of technology consulting and digital solutions, partnered with NVIDIA to launch a new education-focused Large Language Model (LLM) under its Project Indus initiative. Tech Mahindr... [2934 chars]

title: AI-MET Launch: Transforming India's Manufacturing Landscape
description: A White Paper Concept titled 'AI for Manufacturing Engineering Technology (AI-MET)' has been introduced to foster scalable artificial intelligence adoption in India's manufacturing sector. The initiative aims to enhance productivity and competitiveness while promoting collaboration between industry, academia, and government for sustainable growth and inclusive innovation.
content: The Union Minister for Electronics and Information Technology, Shri Ashwini Vaishnaw, unveiled a White Paper Concept on 'AI for Manufacturing Engineering Technology (AI-MET)' in New Delhi. The initiative signifies a strategic push towards responsible... [832 chars]

description: Artificial intelligence could shake up car insurance stocks as autonomous vehicles become more ubiquitous.
content:

title: Greece Secures AI Pledges from Tech Giants to Revamp Digital State Services
description: Greece has secured commitments from global tech giants, including OpenAI and Microsoft, to integrate artificial intelligence into its public services, Digital Governance Minister Dimitris Papastergiou announced following a major summit in India.

title: Global AI Impact Summit: UN Chief calls for global unity, says science
description: UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres on Friday called for utilising Artificial Intelligence for global good and mitigate challenges being faced by humanity.
